title: Review: The Cervelo Caledonia-5 Is Updated, Even If It Didn’t Really Need To Be
content:
The Caledonia-5 adds in frame-storage to what is already one of the best all-road bikes you'll find, but is that enough?

Read the full article at Review: The Cervelo Caledonia-5 Is Updated, Even If It Didn’t Really Need To Be on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
